title: Rundll32 comsvcs.dll MiniDump (LSASS Dump)
description: Detects rundll32 usage of comsvcs.dll MiniDump, a common LSASS dumping technique.
sigma:
title: Rundll32 comsvcs.dll MiniDump (LSASS Dump)
id: RULE-012
description: Detects rundll32 usage of comsvcs.dll MiniDump, a common LSASS dumping technique.
author: detpack-lab
status: stable
logsource:
  product: windows
  service: sysmon
detection:
  selection:
    EventID: 1
    Image|endswith: "\\rundll32.exe"
    CommandLine|contains:
      - comsvcs.dll
      - MiniDump
  condition: selection
falsepositives:
  - Rare; some admin tooling may use rundll32 (review)
level: critical
tags:
  - attack.t1003
  - attack.credential_access
elastic: EventID:1 and Image:*\\\\rundll32.exe and (CommandLine:*comsvcs.dll* and CommandLine:*MiniDump*)
